dhikrList.meaning: All praise is due to Allah
Glory be to Allah and praise Him

dhikrList.arabic: سبحان الله وبحمده سبحان الله العظيم
dhikrList.transliteration: Subḥān Allāhi wa biḥamdih, Subḥān Allāhil-ʿAẓīm
dhikrList.meaning: Glory be to Allah and praise Him, Glory be to Allah the Magnificent
There is no god but Allah

dhikrList.arabic: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāhu waḥdahu lā sharīka lah
dhikrList.meaning: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, with no partner

dhikrList.arabic: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد وهو على كل شيء قدير
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāhu waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamd, wa Huwa ʿalā kulli shayʾin Qadīr
dhikrList.meaning: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, to Him belongs dominion and praise, and He is capable of all things

dhikrList.arabic: لا إله إلا الله محمد رسول الله
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāh, Muḥammadun Rasūlullāh
dhikrList.meaning: There is no god but Allah, Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah
I seek forgiveness from Allah the Magnificent
I seek Allah's forgiveness and repent to Him

dhikrList.arabic: أستغفر الله الذي لا إله إلا هو الحي القيوم وأتوب إليه
dhikrList.transliteration: Astaghfirullāh alladhī lā ilāha illā Huwal-Ḥayyul-Qayyūm wa atūbu ilayh
dhikrList.meaning: I seek the forgiveness of Allah, there is no god but He, the Living, the Sustainer, and I repent to Him

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم أنت ربي لا إله إلا أنت خلقتني وأنا عبدك وأنا على عهدك ووعدك ما استطعت أعوذ بك من شر ما صنعت أبوء لك بنعمتك علي وأبوء بذنبي فاغفر لي فإنه لا يغفر الذنوب إلا أنت
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma anta Rabbī lā ilāha illā anta, khalaqtanī wa ana ʿabduk...
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no god but You. You created me and I am Your servant

dhikrList.arabic: رب اغفر وارحم وأنت خير الراحمين
dhikrList.meaning: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful

dhikrList.arabic: رب إني ظلمت نفسي فاغفر لي
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī faghfir lī
dhikrList.meaning: My Lord, I have wronged myself, so forgive me

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا اغفر لنا ذنوبنا وإسرافنا في أمرنا
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā ghfir lanā dhunūbanā wa isrāfanā fī amrinā
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, forgive us our sins and our excesses in our affairs
My Lord, forgive me and my parents
O Possessor of Majesty and Honor
O The Guide to the Right Path
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم صل على محمد وعلى آل محمد كما صليت على إبراهيم وعلى آل إبراهيم إنك حميد مجيد
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āli Muḥammad kamā ṣallayta ʿalā Ibrāhīm wa ʿalā āli Ibrāhīm, innaka Ḥamīdun Majīd
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy and Glorious
Peace and blessings be upon him

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم صل على محمد وعلى آل محمد وبارك على محمد وعلى آل محمد
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āli Muḥammad wa bārik ʿalā Muḥammad wa ʿalā āli Muḥammad
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, send prayers and blessings upon Muhammad and his family

dhikrList.arabic: لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh
dhikrList.meaning: There is no power and no strength except with Allah
Allah is sufficient for me, and He is the best Disposer of affairs
Allah is sufficient for us and He is the best Disposer of affairs
I have placed my trust in Allah

dhikrList.arabic: لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله العلي العظيم
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāhil-ʿAliyyil-ʿAẓīm
dhikrList.meaning: There is no power except with Allah, the Most High, the Most Great
I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed

dhikrList.arabic: أعوذ بكلمات الله التامات من شر ما خلق
dhikrList.transliteration: Aʿūdhu bi-kalimātillāhit-tāmmāti min sharri mā khalaq
dhikrList.meaning: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created

dhikrList.arabic: بسم الله الذي لا يضر مع اسمه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء وهو السميع العليم
dhikrList.transliteration: Bismillāhil-ladhī lā yaḍurru maʿasmihi shayʾun fil-arḍi wa lā fis-samāʾi wa Huwas-Samīʿul-ʿAlīm
dhikrList.meaning: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing

dhikrList.arabic: أعوذ بالله السميع العليم من الشيطان الرجيم
dhikrList.meaning: I seek refuge in Allah, the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing, from Satan the accursed

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika minal-hammi wal-ḥazan
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من العجز والكسل
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika minal-ʿajzi wal-kasal
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from incapacity and laziness

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من البخل والجبن
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika minal-bukhli wal-jubn
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from miserliness and cowardice

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من فتنة النار وعذاب النار
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika min fitnatin-nār wa ʿadhābin-nār
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trial of the Fire and the punishment of the Fire
I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed
There is no god but Allah
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

dhikrList.transliteration: Innā lillāhi wa innā ilayhi rājiʿūn
dhikrList.meaning: Verily we belong to Allah, and verily to Him we return
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds
My Lord, increase me in knowledge

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا آتنا في الدنيا حسنة وفي الآخرة حسنة وقنا عذاب النار
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā ātinā fid-dunyā ḥasanatan wa fil-ākhirati ḥasanatan wa qinā ʿadhāban-nār
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter and protect us from the punishment of the Fire

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا لا تزغ قلوبنا بعد إذ هديتنا وهب لنا من لدنك رحمة إنك أنت الوهاب
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā lā tuzigh qulūbanā baʿda idh hadaytanā wa hab lanā mil-ladunka raḥmah innaka antal-Wahhāb
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us mercy from Yourself
My Lord, make it easy and do not make it difficult

dhikrList.arabic: رب هب لي من لدنك ذرية طيبة إنك سميع الدعاء
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbi hab lī mil-ladunka dhurriyyatan ṭayyibah innaka Samīʿud-duʿāʾ
dhikrList.meaning: My Lord, grant me good offspring from You, indeed You are the Hearer of supplication

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا لا تؤاخذنا إن نسينا أو أخطأنا
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā lā tuʾākhidhnā in nasīnā aw akhṭaʾnā
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, do not blame us if we forget or make a mistake

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا أفرغ علينا صبرا وثبت أقدامنا وانصرنا على القوم الكافرين
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā afrigh ʿalaynā ṣabran wa thabbit aqdāmanā wanṣurnā ʿalal-qawmil-kāfirīn
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant our feet firmly and give us victory over the disbelieving people

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا لا تجعلنا فتنة للذين كفروا
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, make us not a trial for those who disbelieve

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا هب لنا من أزواجنا وذرياتنا قرة أعين
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wa dhurriyyātinā qurrata aʿyun wajʿalnā lil-muttaqīna imāmā
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, grant us comfort in our spouses and children and make us leaders for the righteous

dhikrList.arabic: ربنا ولا تحملنا ما لا طاقة لنا به
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbanā wa lā tuḥammilnā mā lā ṭāqata lanā bih
dhikrList.meaning: Our Lord, do not burden us with what we cannot bear
My Lord, I am overpowered, so help me

dhikrList.arabic: رب لا تذرني فردا وأنت خير الوارثين
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa anta khayrul-wārithīn
dhikrList.meaning: My Lord, do not leave me alone, and You are the best of inheritors

dhikrList.arabic: رب إني لما أنزلت إلي من خير فقير
dhikrList.transliteration: Rabbi innī limā anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqīr
dhikrList.meaning: My Lord, I am in need of whatever good You send down to me
O Allah, I ask You for well-being

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أسألك الجنة وأعوذ بك من النار
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī asʾaluka-l-jannah wa aʿūdhu bika minan-nār
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and seek refuge in You from the Fire

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إنا نسألك من خير ما سألك منه نبيك محمد
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innā nasʾaluka min khayri mā saʾalaka minhu nabiyyuka Muḥammad
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, we ask You for the good that Your Prophet Muhammad asked of You
Praise be to Allah in all circumstances
Glory be to my Lord, the Magnificent
Glory be to my Lord, the Most High
All praise is due to Allah

dhikrList.arabic: سبحان الله وبحمده سبحان الله العظيم
dhikrList.transliteration: Subḥān Allāhi wa biḥamdih, Subḥān Allāhil-ʿAẓīm
dhikrList.meaning: Glory be to Allah and praise Him, Glory be to Allah the Magnificent
May Allah be pleased with him

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي بنعمته تتم الصالحات
dhikrList.meaning: Praise be to Allah by whose favor good deeds are accomplished
Praise be to Allah in all circumstances
May Allah reward you with goodness

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي بنعمته تتم الصالحات
dhikrList.meaning: Praise be to Allah by whose favor good deeds are accomplished
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor
O Allah, bless us in it

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي عافاني مما ابتلاك به
dhikrList.meaning: Praise be to Allah who has saved me from what He has afflicted you with
O Allah, make it beneficial knowledge
O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me
We have entered the morning and the sovereignty belongs to Allah

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي أحيانا بعد ما أماتنا وإليه النشور
dhikrList.transliteration: Alḥamdu lillāhil-ladhī aḥyānā baʿda mā amātanā wa ilayin-nushūr
dhikrList.meaning: Praise is to Allah who gave us life after death and to Him is the resurrection
I have entered the morning upon the natural religion of Islam

dhikrList.arabic: الله لا إله إلا هو الحي القيوم
dhikrList.meaning: Allah, there is no god but He, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer
We have entered the evening and the sovereignty belongs to Allah
I have entered the evening upon the natural religion of Islam
In Your name O Allah, I die and I live

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي أحيانا بعد ما أماتنا وإليه النشور
dhikrList.transliteration: Alḥamdu lillāhil-ladhī aḥyānā baʿda mā amātanā wa ilayin-nushūr
dhikrList.meaning: Praise is to Allah who gave us life after causing us to die and to Him is the resurrection

dhikrList.arabic: الحمد لله الذي أطعمنا وسقانا وجعلنا مسلمين
dhikrList.transliteration: Alḥamdu lillāhil-ladhī aṭʿamanā wa saqānā wa jaʿalanā muslimīn
dhikrList.meaning: Praise be to Allah who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims

dhikrList.arabic: بسم الله توكلت على الله ولا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
dhikrList.transliteration: Bismillāh, tawakkaltu ʿalallāh, wa lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh
dhikrList.meaning: In the name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah, and there is no power and no strength except with Allah

dhikrList.arabic: بسم الله ولجنا وبسم الله خرجنا وعلى ربنا توكلنا
dhikrList.transliteration: Bismillāh walajnā wa bismillāh kharajnā wa ʿalā rabbinā tawakkalnā
dhikrList.meaning: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we rely
O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy
O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty

dhikrList.arabic: سبحان الذي سخر لنا هذا وما كنا له مقرنين وإنا إلى ربنا لمنقلبون
dhikrList.transliteration: Subḥānal-ladhī sakhkhara lanā hādhā wa mā kunnā lahu muqrinīn wa innā ilā rabbinā lamunqalibūn
dhikrList.meaning: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could not have done it ourselves, and to our Lord we will surely return

dhikrList.arabic: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد يحيي ويميت وهو حي لا يموت بيده الخير وهو على كل شيء قدير
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāhu waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamd, yuḥyī wa yumīt, wa Huwa Ḥayyun lā yamūt, biyadihil-khayr, wa Huwa ʿalā kulli shayʾin Qadīr
dhikrList.meaning: There is no god but Allah alone with no partner, to Him belongs dominion and praise, He gives life and death, and He is Ever-Living and never dies, in His hand is all good, and He is capable of all things

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika minal-hammi wal-ḥazan
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief
Praise is to Allah who has clothed me with this

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخبث والخبائث
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika minal-khubuthi wal-khabāʾith
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from male and female evil spirits

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم كما حسنت خلقي فحسن خلقي
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma kamā ḥassanta khalqī fa-ḥassin khuluqī
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, as You made my appearance good, make my character good
May Allah have mercy on you

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم لك صمت وعلى رزقك أفطرت
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma laka ṣumtu wa ʿalā rizqika afṭart
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, for You I fasted and with Your provision I break my fast

dhikrList.arabic: أشهد أن لا إله إلا الله وأن محمدا رسول الله
dhikrList.transliteration: Ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh wa anna Muḥammadan Rasūlullāh
dhikrList.meaning: I testify that there is no god but Allah and that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم رب هذه الدعوة التامة والصلاة القائمة آت محمدا الوسيلة والفضيلة
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma Rabba hādhihid-daʿwatit-tāmmah waṣ-ṣalātil-qāʾimah, āti Muḥammadanil-wasīlata wal-faḍīlah
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and established prayer, grant Muhammad the means and the virtue

dhikrList.arabic: لا بأس طهور إن شاء الله
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā baʾsa ṭahūrun in shāʾ Allāh
dhikrList.meaning: No harm, it is purification if Allah wills

dhikrList.arabic: إنا لله وإنا إليه راجعون اللهم اغفر له وارحمه
dhikrList.transliteration: Innā lillāhi wa innā ilayhi rājiʿūn, Allāhummaghfir lahu warḥamh
dhikrList.meaning: We belong to Allah and to Him we return. O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him

dhikrList.arabic: سبحان الذي يسبح الرعد بحمده والملائكة من خيفته
dhikrList.transliteration: Subḥānal-ladhī yusabbiḥur-raʿdu bi-ḥamdih wal-malāʾikatu min khīfatih
dhikrList.meaning: Glory be to Him whom the thunder glorifies with His praise and the angels out of fear of Him

dhikrList.arabic: الله أكبر اللهم أهله علينا بالأمن والإيمان والسلامة والإسلام
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhu Akbar, Allāhumma ahillahu ʿalaynā bil-amni wal-īmāni was-salāmati wal-Islām
dhikrList.meaning: Allah is the Greatest. O Allah, bring it upon us with security, faith, safety and Islam

dhikrList.arabic: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد وهو على كل شيء قدير
dhikrList.transliteration: Lā ilāha illā Allāhu waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamd, wa Huwa ʿalā kulli shayʾin Qadīr
dhikrList.meaning: There is no god but Allah alone with no partner, to Him belongs dominion and praise, and He is capable of all things
dhikrList.virtue: Best dua on Day of Arafah

dhikrList.arabic: اللهم إنك عفو تحب العفو فاعف عني
dhikrList.transliteration: Allāhumma innaka ʿafuwwun tuḥibbul-ʿafwa fa-ʿfu ʿannī
dhikrList.meaning: O Allah, You are Pardoning and love to pardon, so pardon me
